arts.ttl: Ashvir Singh Johal urges Morecambe side to be "brave" as Shrimps set for Solihull Moors clash
arts.sum: “It’s going to be a real tough game, they’ve got the momentum, they won their last game, they have a new manager. It still isn’t where we want it to be, but over the next few weeks, with more training time, more fitness of the player, more understanding, and more time in the video room, we’ll see a really exciting team.”
